column2: XWC Summit China 2017 - December 10th, 2017, Shanghai Chin
First ever Whitecoin summit in Shanghai, China on December 10th 2017.

The XWC Summit held on December 10th 2017 is the first ever community event for [Whitecoin](https://www.whitecoin.info/). Community members in China organized this event and invited Whitecoin lead developer _Oizopower_ and team member _Waligu_ for a meet-and-greet and to hold a talk. The majority of the Chinese Whitecoin community will be present but the event is open to all blockchain enthusiast.

Join us for a first of it's kind Whitecoin event full with inspiring talks. You'll have a great time and meet great people!

3 / F, Legend Plaza, 635 Bibo Road, Zhangjiang Hi-tech Park, Pudong New District, Shanghai

[View on Baidu Maps](http://j.map.baidu.com/XLr9N)
Pioneer and lead developer of Whitecoin. Oizopower has been invited by the Chinese community to hold a talk on the history of Whitecoin and it's future.
LiZhi is one of the developers working on the XWC wallet. Previously he helped develop the Feathercoin wallet but since November 2017 exclusively works on Whitecoin.
Waligu is a long time community member who played an important role in the coinswap and has helpt keep the community alive.
Will is an active member in the Chinese community and has been helping promote Whitecoin in China since September 2017.
**Venue of the meeting:** 3 / F, Legend Plaza, 635 Bibo Road, Zhangjiang Hi-tech Park, Pudong New District, Shanghai.
**Banquet venue:** 1 / F, Legend Plaza, 635 Bibo Road, Zhangjiang High Technology Park, Pudong New District, Shanghai.
**Public transport:** Entrance 3 of Zhangjiang high-tech station, metro line 2
All participants will be given a Whitecoin Community New year T-Shirt. Please add the size of the shirt to the official WeChat of the Whitecoin Community to leave a message.
LiZhi: Application and development outline of WhiteCoin
Will Wang: My investment logic of WhiteCoin

The _standard ticket_ gives you full access to the summit. A seat will be reserverd for you for all talks including the keynote speach. You'll be able to meet the Whitecoin community members, ask questions and learn all about XWC. You'll also be given an exclusive Whitecoin Community New Year's T-shirt.

Don't want to miss a thing? Then the _Premium ticket_ is for you! You'll have all the same privilges as the standard ticker but you'll also be invited to the Banquet Dinner. This is a more closed, exclusive, event for ticket holders. You'll get some great 1-on-1 time with the most important members of the XWC team and community.
